subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Curlin, the reigning horse of the year, is scheduled to make his next start on the dirt in the Woodward on Aug. 30 at Saratoga in New York.
snippet: Curlin, the reigning horse of the year, is scheduled to make his next start on the dirt in the Woodward on Aug. 30 at Saratoga in New York.
